goods.name: Burton
goods.description: One board to rule them all, the Never Summer Proto Type Two Snowboard is a quiver-killing, all-mountain machine that goes right from sending knee-deep pow chutes to greasing double-kinks in the park. This asymmetrical twin eliminates the natural unevenness of the human body and leverages NS's Ripsaw Rocker Camber profile for explosive pop, stability, and power.
